description: Bridges: Type should be defined for param `url` in method `Spryker\Client\CartsRestApi\Dependency\Client\CartsRestApiToZedRequestClientBridge::call()`.

Bridges: The bridge interface has incorrect method signature for `call()`. Missed return type. That violates the rule "All bridge interface methods must have exactly the same or more strict signature as their parent"
Boolean methods do not use `get` prefix, use `is`/`has` instead or alike. Getter `Spryker\Glue\CartsRestApi\CartsRestApiConfig::getAllowedCartItemEagerRelationship()` must not return bool.
Boolean methods do not use `get` prefix, use `is`/`has` instead or alike. Getter `Spryker\Glue\CartsRestApi\CartsRestApiConfig::getAllowedGuestCartItemEagerRelationship()` must not return bool.

Bridges: The bridge interface has incorrect method signature for `reloadItems()`. Missed return type. That violates the rule "All bridge interface methods must have exactly the same or more strict signature as their parent"
